ask your midwife or health 
visitor about it. They may

cream. If the rash seems to be 
painful and will not go away,

Babies’	poo	(stools)	
Immediately after birth and 
for	the	first	few	days,	your	
baby is likely to pass a sticky, 
greenish-black substance. 
This is called meconium and it 
is the waste that has collected 
in your baby’s bowels while 
they were in your womb.
